Player.cs
{{{namespace GameManagement
{
    public class Player
    {
        public Player(string playerName, string skillLevel)
        {
            Name = playerName;
            Level = skillLevel;
        }

        public string Name { get; }

        public string Level { get; set; }

        public override bool Equals(object obj)
        {
            var other = obj as Player;
            return other != null && Name.Equals(other.Name);
        }

        public override int GetHashCode() => Name.GetHashCode();
    }
}
}}}
!-PlayerCollection.cs-!
{{{using System.Collections.Generic;
using System.Linq;

namespace GameManagement
{
    public class PlayerCollection : HashSet<Player>
    {
        public Player FindOnName(string playerName) => 
            (from Player p in this where p.Name == playerName select p).FirstOrDefault();

        public IEnumerable<Player> WithLevel(string level) => 
            from Player p in this where p.Level == level select p;
    }
}
}}}
